critique: The document establishes an interagency working group to promote positive results for at-risk youth. It focuses on collaboration, identifying effective strategies, and online publication of information. There is no mention of immigration. The document broadens the executive's reach by establishing an interagency working group. The document encourages collaboration among government organizations at the Federal, State, and local level. The document prioritizes national security and law enforcement powers. The document involves the government in economic matters. The document promotes inclusivity and encourages pluralism.
